# EntityWantsJockeyComponent Class

## Extends
- [*EntityComponent*](EntityComponent.md)

When added, this component signifies that this entity wants to become a jockey.

## Constants

### **componentId**
`static read-only componentId = "minecraft:wants_jockey";`

Type: *string*
